-------file: "./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=Single]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[text?before=\&\[\n&after=\n\]&PadRight=\\ ,breakstring?width=60,flags=word]

-------file: "./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=Single, breakstring?width=90&flags=word&eol=none]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=Single, breakstring?width=90&flags=word&eol=none]

-------file: "./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=Single, breakstring?width=90&flags=word&eol=none,text?padleft=]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=Single, breakstring?width=90&flags=word&eol=none,text?padleft=]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=multi]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=multi]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc, breakstring?width=80&flags=word&eol=none]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=jsdoc, breakstring?width=80&flags=word&eol=none]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=0,text?padleft=0]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=0,text?padleft=0]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=4]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=4]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=4,, , text?padleft=6,, ]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=jsdoc&padleft=4,, , text?padleft=6,, ]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsdoc,text?padleft= — , breakstring?width=70&flags=word&eol=none]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=jsdoc,text?padleft= — , breakstring?width=70&flags=word&eol=none]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=bad, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=bad, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]



-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=pound]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=pound]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=html, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=html, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=html, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace1.txt")[comment?type=html, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace1.txt")[comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace3.txt")[comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=100&flags=word]

-------file: ("./fixtures/replace4.txt")
-------options: [comment?type=jsAuto, breakstring?width=200&eol=none&flags=word]
